backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing core backend logic for user profiles, role-based authorization, tournaments, in-app wallet balances, transactions, top-up and withdrawal requests. It defines domain types, state storage, sorting helpers, and guarded query/update methods for users and admins.
feature_evidence.json: Structured report mapping high-level product features to frontend files, components, test requirements, and confidence levels. Serves as traceability evidence linking implemented code to feature requirements.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Pre-written summaries of all major frontend source files describing their responsibilities across routing, hooks, components, pages, utilities, and localization. Acts as documentation for frontend architecture and feature coverage.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS setup defining design tokens, light/dark theme variables, sidebar colors, and base element styles. Establishes consistent theming and layout styling for the entire frontend.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the frontend application that mounts the React app and sets basic metadata and page title. Loads the Vite/React main module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React application configuring TanStack Router, authentication flow, profile setup gating, theme provider, and global query/toast providers. Wires all main routes such as dashboard, tournaments, wallet, admin, top-up, and withdrawal pages.
frontend/src/components/admin/CreateTour: Admin-only UI panel that provides a form to create new tournaments with name and entry fee. Uses tournament mutation hooks, local tournament ID storage, validation, and toast feedback.
frontend/src/components/admin/TopUpReque: Admin panel that fetches and displays top-up requests in a table, showing user, amount, and status. Allows approving pending top-ups with loading states and success/error toasts.
frontend/src/components/admin/VerifyTour: Admin form that verifies a tournament by ID using a mutation hook. Shows success or error feedback via toasts and resets input on success.
frontend/src/components/admin/Withdrawal: Admin panel that lists withdrawal requests with user, amount, payout details, and status. Supports approving requests and marking them completed with corresponding actions and toasts.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: Displays an access denied message for non-admin users with a button to navigate back to the dashboard.
Wrapper component that checks if the current user is an admin before rendering children. Shows a loading spinner or an access denied screen when appropriate.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button integrated with Internet Identity that handles authentication state, retries edge cases, and clears cached queries on logout.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginScreen: Full-page login screen prompting the user to authenticate with Internet Identity, showing a loading state during login.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal dialog that forces new users to enter and save their display name. Submits profile data via a mutation and shows toast feedback.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Main application layout with header, navigation, content area, and footer. Displays the app logo, current user name, and login button.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppNav.ts: Responsive navigation component with mobile and desktop variants. Builds menu items dynamically and includes an admin link when the user is an admin.
frontend/src/hooks/queryKeys.ts: Centralized definition of React Query keys for user, wallet, admin, top-up, withdrawal, and tournament-related queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and caches a backend actor based on the current Internet Identity. Reinitializes access control, supports anonymous access, and invalidates dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuth.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching and mutating the caller's user profile and role, and checking admin status via the backend actor. Also exposes a combined useAuth hook that reports authentication and admin state using Internet Identity.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity context and provider using Dfinity AuthClient to manage login, logout, persisted identity, and detailed login status flags across the app.
frontend/src/hooks/useTopUps.ts: Defines React Query hooks to create, fetch, and approve top-up requests through the backend actor, with cache invalidation for top-up history and wallet data.
frontend/src/hooks/useTournaments.ts: Provides mutation hooks to create, verify, and join tournaments via the backend actor, invalidating wallet queries when joining affects balances.
frontend/src/hooks/useWallet.ts: Exposes React Query hooks to fetch wallet balance and transaction history, plus a helper to invalidate related wallet queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useWithdrawals.ts: Contains hooks for requesting withdrawals and for admins to fetch, approve, and complete withdrawal requests, with appropriate cache and wallet invalidation.
frontend/src/i18n/index.ts: Exports a simple translation helper that maps translation keys to Nepali strings and falls back to the key if missing.
frontend/src/i18n/np.ts: Defines the Nepali translation dictionary covering common UI text, authentication, tournaments, wallet, admin panels, and error messages.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind CSS base layers and defines extensive CSS variables for light and dark themes, including colors, radius, and layout styling.
frontend/src/lib/tournamentStore.ts: Utility module for persisting tournament IDs in localStorage, with functions to get, add, and remove stored IDs safely.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that initializes React, sets up React Query and Internet Identity providers, and renders the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPage.tsx: Admin-only page wrapped in an AdminGuard that renders a tabbed interface for managing tournaments, verifications, top-up requests, and withdrawal requests.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Renders the main dashboard with a hero section showing the user's wallet balance and quick navigation cards to tournaments, wallet, top-up, and withdraw pages.
frontend/src/pages/TopUpPage.tsx: Provides a form to request wallet top-ups and displays the user's top-up request history with status indicators.
Displays basic tournament details for a given tournament ID and allows the user to join the tournament with error handling and notifications.
frontend/src/pages/TournamentsPage.tsx: Allows users to add and manage a local list of tournament IDs and navigate to detailed views for each tournament.
frontend/src/pages/WalletPage.tsx: Shows the user's current wallet balance and a table of transaction history with translated transaction types.
frontend/src/pages/WithdrawPage.tsx: Provides a withdrawal request form with provider selection and displays the user's withdrawal request history and statuses.
frontend/src/utils/errorMapping.ts: Maps common backend or string-based error messages to user-friendly Nepali translations using i18n keys.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helper functions to read URL parameters from query strings or hash-based routes, persist them in sessionStorage, and retrieve or clear them. Includes logic to prioritize URL values, fall back to session storage, and safely handle browser APIs.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining dark mode, content paths, container settings, and an extended theme with OKLCH-based color tokens, radii, shadows, and animations. Registers typography, container queries, and animation plugins.
project_state.json: Machine-readable snapshot of the product roadmap describing a Nepali game platform with wallets, verified tournaments, admin workflows, withdrawals, localization, and core screens. Tracks schema/version metadata and a list of implemented features tied to requirement IDs.
